name: ndb2
description: Nostradambot 2.0 Betting Game for the Off-Nominal Discord

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=dev pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-api-types build && concurrently "pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-api-types dev" "pnpm --filter ndb2-api dev" "pnpm --filter ndb2-api sql-watch"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-api-types build && pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-db build && pnpm --filter ndb2-api build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-api-types build && pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-db build && concurrently "pnpm --filter ndb2-api test" "pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-db test"
scripts.test:watch: pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-api-types build && pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-db build && concurrently "pnpm --filter ndb2-api test:watch" "pnpm --filter @offnominal/ndb2-db test:watch"

author: Jake Robins
